item.description:
A NIGHT OUT THAT WON'T BREAK THE BANK!

Come and enjoy a burger and beer before the holidays begin. Prime 16 is the place for great burgers and beer...reasonable prices in a unique and comfortable enviroment. The best craft brewed beers in the world and an extensive bottle list. No bad brews here.

They do have options for those not into beef

http://www.prime16.co...

If you're feeling adventurous and up for some out of the ordinary fun, join us at 10 pm for a Drag show at 168 York Street Cafe
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for the dining meetup group

group.name: The New Haven Area Dining Out Group

item.name: Burgers and Beer
